sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

msDesc.head: Girolamo Savonarola OP, Commentary on Psalms 50 (Miserere mei ) and 30 (In te domine speravi)
Savonarola
msDesc.p: Vellum and paper, 202 132 , 8 x 5.6, ff. 2 + 68 + 2, vellum, 22 lines to a page. Cent. xv late, in a good clear Flemish (?) hand, very slightly sloping. Ornaments in English style. Binding of cent. xvi, with some gold tooling.
Collation: 2 flyleaves | a quire of paper | 18-78 86 96 | 48 leaves of paper | 2 flyleaves of vellum.
On f. iir: Liber Thome booth (xv-xvi) and other notes.
On f. iiv: William boothe (erased) owethe this booke.

On the vellum flyleaf at the end (f.lviv):
Sum liber thome booth habitantis stauntonie. Si mea penna valet rectior mea littera fiet.
15 blank leaves of paper follow ff. iiir-xviiv.
ff. 55r-68v are blank. 48 blank paper leaves follow (ff. xviiir-lviiv).
The text of the manuscript was edited with a facsimile and an English version by Dr Perowne, late Master, in 1900.
ff. i-xvii + 1-68 + xviii (xix-xxxix blank and not imaged) + xl (xli-lxiii blank and not imaged) + lxiv-lxvii.

msItem.head: Girolamo Savonarola OP. Commentary on psalm 50 (Miserere mei )

head.title: Reverendi patris fratris Ieronimi Savonarolae de Ferrara, ordinis predicatorum, expositio in psalmum quinquagesimum dum erat in vinculis

msItem.rubric: Reuerendi patris fratris Ieronimi etc. (as Nasmith) ... vinculis

ab.decoNote: Border in English style: no ground: feather-ornament and conventional foliage

msItem.head: Girolamo Savonarola OP. Commentary on psalm 30 (In te domine speravi)

head.title: Ejusdem expositio vel meditatio in psalmum In te, Domine, speravi quam in ultimis diebus dum vitae suae finem prasstolaretur edidit, et quam morte preventus explere non potuit

msItem.rubric: Exposicio vel meditacio fratris hieronymi Sauonarole de ferraria ordinis sacri predicatorum in psalmum. In te domine speraui quam in ultimis diebus dum vite sue finem prestolaretur edidit
msItem.incipit: Tristicia obsedit me magno et forte exercitu
msItem.explicit: et propter nomen tuum deduces me et enutries me
Explicit exposicio etc. in psalmum In te domine speraui quam morte preuentus explere non potuit
